bibl.title: Receipts for Sitônion, Syntaxis, and Epistatikon from Karanis: Evidence for Fiscal Reform in Augustan Egypt?
bibl.note: Dating and Money Values. - Receipts for σιτώνιον. - Receipts for σύνταξις. - Receipt for ἐπιστατικόν. - Receipts for Unspecified Taxes. - Conclusion. - Pp. 225-230: Appendix. Re-edition of bilingual (Greek and Demotic) Receipts [1. Receipts for σύνταξις (O. Mich. II, 701; 702; 711), 69-39 BCE; - 2. Receipts for Unspecified Taxes (O. Mich. I, 300; 301; 666; II, 754, 756), 81-30 BCE].
bibl.seg: Andrew Monson, Receipts for Sitônion, Syntaxis, and Epistatikon from Karanis: Evidence for Fiscal Reform in Augustan Egypt?
ZPE 191 (2014) pp. 207-230, 4 tabl., 2 graphiques, 4 figg., 3 fac-sim., 1 pl.
